room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by CluedIn Escape Rooms in Chicago
room_description: You and your friends have been invited to participate in a psychological study. When you arrive you find out the address is an abandoned mental hospital. Everything seems OK though, and the study goes as you would expect. But things start to take a turn, and soon you and your friends have to race against the clock to save yourselves and your host from an evil entity.
